case.name: AWB Limited v Honourable Terence Rhoderic Hudson Cole (No 4) [2006] FCA 1050 (10 August 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: the case concerns a document entitled 'cole inquiry
draft statement of contrition
andrew lindberg.' the document became exhibit 665 in the commission of inquiry which is being conducted by commissioner cole ('the inquiry') under the royal commissions act 1902 ('rca').
